definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The lubricative path is a slightness hole which is oblique to the crank.
sentences.chinese: 此油道属细长孔，且于轴线成一定的角度。

sentences.english: He drew an axis on it first then fixed it carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他首先在发电机上画了一条轴线然后仔细修理起来。

sentences.english: Commerce has always played a central role on this east-west axis.
sentences.chinese: 在这条东西向的轴线上，商业总是扮演着主角。

sentences.english: The area hosts the most influential urban axis in the Northwest part of China.
sentences.chinese: 该地区位于中国西北部最具有影响力的城市中轴线上。

sentences.english: You know, they can all pass through the same axis.
sentences.chinese: 它们可以穿过同一条轴线。

sentences.english: The southern part of the axis has proved more difficult to beautify.
sentences.chinese: 中轴线的南边部分则比较难美化。

sentences.english: The main grating fix up in the gyre axis.
sentences.chinese: 主轴线回转的光栅修理起来。

sentences.english: The Expo Axis is the main axis in Pudong Expo Site.
sentences.chinese: 世博轴式浦东世博园区的主轴线。

sentences.english: A standard program with second order element analysis for calculating the characteristic impedances of various coaxial lines is developed.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一个用二次元求解同轴线特性阻抗的通用程序。

sentences.english: The same machine was used by Pomeroy (1970) to explore the effect of skew.
sentences.chinese: 利用同样装置对轴线交错的影响进行了探索。

sentences.english: Chelsea's centre-halves will be haunted by the memory of confronting the Colombian.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西的中轴线遇到哥伦比亚人时堪称噩梦。

sentences.english: Imports of cut-off valve stem and valve seat sealing surface perpendicular to the axis.
sentences.chinese: 进口截止阀的阀杆轴线与阀座密封面垂直。

sentences.english: First, you draw the horizontal and vertical axes.
sentences.chinese: 首先，绘制水平和垂直轴线。

sentences.english: The ferrules have outer walls that are parallel to the axis of the bore.
sentences.chinese: 冷压头已是平行孔轴线的外墙。

sentences.english: The Geographic South Pole is where Earth's axis of rotation intersects its surface.
sentences.chinese: 地理上的南极点是地球自转轴线与表面的交差处。

sentences.english: Piacentina stone covered wall confines the house all the way through the north-south axis;
sentences.chinese: 石墙通过南北中轴线始终定义着别墅的边界。

definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
axle/(fig.) central element/key element/axis (alliance of nations)
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
angle of intersection/angle at which two lines meet
